Description: Detects anomalies by auto-selecting statistical thresholds (z-score & percentile) for feature spikes.
Applies physically meaningful rules: high speed >500 km/s, density >5 cm⁻³, and flux >1e7.
Applies anomaly detection on multivariate feature space using Isolation Forest algorithm.
Combines weighted feature scores (flux, speed, density, thermal) into one composite metric.
Combines results from stats, physics, and ML; flags event if 2 or more methods agree.
